key.name: blacklisted-media-players
key.summary: A list of applications blacklisted from the sound menu
key.description: Each media player which abides by the MPRIS2 spec will automatically appear in the menu. This array should contain the desktop file names (minus .desktop suffix) of applications which do not want to be included in the sound menu.

key.name: interested-media-players
key.summary: A list of applications which at some point have registered with the sound menu
key.description: Each media player which abides by the MPRIS2 spec will automatically appear in the menu. This array should contain the desktop file names (minus .desktop suffix) of applications which have at some point appeared in the menU. This allows the menu remember and display offlined applications.

key.name: preferred-media-players
key.summary: A list of applications that will have player controls visible all the time
key.description: A list of applications that will have player controls visible all the time

key.name: global-mute
key.summary: Initial setting for global mute (mute all) on the menu
key.description: On start up volume should not be muted.

key.name: show-notify-osd-on-scroll
key.summary: Initial setting for showing notify-osd notification on scroll volume-change
key.description: When using the mouse scroll-wheel over the indicator-sound icon, the volume changes. Enabling this setting, every scroll volume-change a notify-osd bubble with the updated volume value will be shown (if supported by your notification daemon).

key.name: visible
key.summary: Whether or not to show the sound indicator in the menu bar.
key.description: Whether or not to show the sound indicator in the menu bar.

key.name: greeter-export
key.summary: Whether or not to export the currently playing song to the greeter.
key.description: If enabled the sound indicator will export the current player and song to the greeter so that it can be shown if the user is selected and the sound menu is shown.
